meanings.sent1: The corbinas swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught many corbinas during the fishing competition.
meanings.sent3: The corbinas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The corbinas in the ocean danced together like a synchronized team.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the corbinas sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: We saw a school of corbinas swimming near the shore.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen proudly displayed their catch of corbinas.
meanings.sent3: The corbinas gathered for a group photo, all smiling for the camera.
meanings.sent4: The corbinas in the market looked like a sea of silver.
meanings.sent5: The corbinas were lined up neatly in rows, ready to be sold at the market.
